Uses of Interface
io.ebean.config.dbplatform.SqlLimiter

  • Packages that use SqlLimiter 
    Package Description
    io.ebean.config.dbplatform
    Database platform specific support
    io.ebean.config.dbplatform.db2
    DB2 specific support.
    io.ebean.config.dbplatform.sqlanywhere
    SqlAnywhere specific support.
    io.ebean.config.dbplatform.sqlserver
    SqlServer specific support.

    • Uses of SqlLimiter in io.ebean.config.dbplatform

      Classes in io.ebean.config.dbplatform that implement SqlLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LimitOffsetSqlLimiter
      Adds LIMIT OFFSET clauses to a SQL query.
      class  RowNumberSqlLimiter
      Adds the ROW_NUMBER() OVER function to a query.
      class  RownumSqlLimiter
      Add ROWNUM column etc around SQL query to limit results.
      Methods in io.ebean.config.dbplatform that return SqlLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SqlLimiter DatabasePlatform.getSqlLimiter()
      Return the SqlLimiter used to apply additional sql around a query to limit its results.

    • Uses of SqlLimiter in io.ebean.config.dbplatform.db2

      Classes in io.ebean.config.dbplatform.db2 that implement SqlLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Db2SqlLimiter 

    • Uses of SqlLimiter in io.ebean.config.dbplatform.sqlanywhere

      Classes in io.ebean.config.dbplatform.sqlanywhere that implement SqlLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SqlAnywhereLimiter
      Use top xx and start at xx to limit sql results.

    • Uses of SqlLimiter in io.ebean.config.dbplatform.sqlserver

      Classes in io.ebean.config.dbplatform.sqlserver that implement SqlLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SqlServer2005SqlLimiter
      Use top and row_number() function to limit sql results.
      class  SqlServerSqlLimiter
      Use ANSI offset rows syntax or top n - SQL Server 2012 onwards.
